attributes.action: Public Enquiry Against Celtic Football Club For Historic Child Abuse
attributes.background: Hidden secrets , refusal to apologise or compensate victims, this club should be demoted or.even removed from there football association for the sheer disrespect and crimes against innocent children chasing a dream.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Child protection, including inquiries into historic child abuse is devolved to the Scottish Government.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
